TAGCREATE_DESCRIPTION: Creates a tag for cards or Version Tokens
TC_MAX_TAGS: {{author}} You have reached the maximum number tags you can create
INVALID_TAGNAME_FORMAT: {{author}} The name of your tag must be alphanumeric and cannot contain special characters, spaces or profanity of any kind
LONG_TAGNAME: {{author}} The name of your tag can only be **20** characters long
TAGNAME_EXISTS: {{author}} You already have a tag with the name `{{tag}}`
TAG_CREATED: {{author}} Successfully created a tag with the name `{{tag}}` | {{emoji}}
TAGCREATE_EXTRA_INFO: Creates a tag for cards or Version Tokens. Tags are a useful feature to categorize and group multiple codes that fit your own criteria. To create a tag a name and emoji needs to be selected for to the tag. Use the "{{prefix}}tag" command to assign the newly created tags to your cards or Version Tokens
